dmca.title: TravelChinaGuide claims text travelled without authorization
dmca.body:
Dear Google, Inc.

I, the webmaster of www.travelchinaguide.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.. I am looking forward for your concerns about the website www.yourstravel.net which copied all our copyrighted pages.

www.yourstravel.net had copied the whole content of travelchinaguide.com without authorization. All of the pictures on yourstravel.net contain the watermark of 'travelchinaguide.com', all of the pages on the website remain the logo of travelchinaguide.com and the links to travelchinaguide.com, from which you can easily find the plagiarizing. You may also find proof via archive.org to see pages of travelchinaguide.com's old versions.

I would ask that the entire site www.yourstravel.net deleted immediately from your search engine. 

www.yourstravel.net contact email: [private]@yourstravel.net

My contact information:
[private]
[private]@yahoo.com
Travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. [private]
[private]
Xi'an, Shaanxi, 710068, P.R.C.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing

web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Yours Sincerely

[signed]
dmca.principal_name: Travelchinaguide.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
